Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, this film depicts his adolescence through the lens of the ideals of agriculture and technology that his family had supported. Childhood days spent on the farm, innocent boys’ love, war, discord, suffering, weakness, sins, business collapse, and disorder are all beautifully intermingled

The cat, whom Alice is going to kill, comes back as a man, has sex with her, and turns everyone around town into cats to create an army.
